RelatedSentence: The Civil Aviation Safety Authority wants a proposed wireless broadband tower near Bathurst to be registered due to its proximity to the local airport .
NBN wants to build the 40 m tower south of Bathurst to increase coverage to the Yarras and Glanmire areas .
